greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Dimension of space of modular forms of weight 1/2, level 4*n and trivial character.
comment: Also, the first nonzero cusp form of weight 1/2 occurs at level 1728.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1200
H. Cohen and J. Oesterle, Dimensions des espaces de formes modulaires, Modular Functions of One Variable. VI, Proc. 1976 Bonn conf., Lect. Notes in Math. 627, Springer-Verlag, 1977, pp. 69-78.
program: (MAGMA) function a(n) return Dimension( ModularForms( Gamma0(4*n), 1/2)); end function; /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 13 2014 */
results.author: _Steven Finch_, Apr 17 2009
ext: Data section filled up to 125 terms by _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 23 2017
